Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to exemptions from the recipient restriction program
Summary: Exempts opioid treatment program services received, including methadone maintenance treatment and the use of buprenorphine, from all recipient restriction program coverage and payment restrictions.
LawCode: Add ยง368-g, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to exemptions from the recipient restriction program
